mapper.select: SELECT rdi.id, rdi.reserve_day_id as reserveDayId, rdi.type, rdi.`status`, rdi.dishes_id as dishesId, rdi.creator_time as creatorTime, rd.creator, rd.family_id AS familyId, d.`name` as dishesName, ui.`name` as userName FROM reserve_day_info AS rdi LEFT JOIN reserve_day AS rd ON rdi.reserve_day_id = rd.id LEFT JOIN dishes AS d ON rdi.dishes_id = d.id LEFT JOIN user_info AS ui ON rdi.creator_user_id = ui.id WHERE rd.id = #{reserveDayId}
